config.googlyeyes.prop.acidTripEyes.name: Acid Trip Eyes
config.googlyeyes.prop.nameOverride.name: Name Override
config.googlyeyes.prop.disabledGoogly.de:
To disable Googly Eyes on a specific entity, put their registry name in here.
EG: "Pig", "Skeleton"
For Players, put "player"
config.googlyeyes.prop.acidTripEyes.desc: Let them googly eyes be trippin'
config.googlyeyes.prop.allPlayersHaveGoo: Should all players have googly eyes?
config.googlyeyes.prop.entityOverrideCha: Entity chance override. Each entry should be a resource location and a chance, separated by a comma. EG: "minecraft:pig,100" will make all minecraft pigs have a 100% chance of having Googly Eyes.
config.googlyeyes.prop.nameOverride.desc: Entities with these names will always have Googly Eyes.
